name: Fatty Shark
description: In „Fatty Shark” you play a hungry predator who needs to eat to grow big!  The Fatty Shark has inherited the control and the basic game style from Flappy Bird, but this game is much more!  Let’s eat all the fish with your shark or avoid them! There are two different scores, eated fish in kilogram, and distance! If you don’t eat, you don’t grow, and the game difficulty is not increasing! It’s your choice!
